resources:
PennyPlanner
// Login flow
Gain total control of your money Know where your money goes Planning ahead Become your own money manager and make every rupee count Track your transaction easily, with categories and financial report Setup your budget for each category so you remain in control
Sign Up Back to Login Sign Up with Google Login with Google Login Forgot Password? Forgot Password? Password Show Password Don\'t have an account? Already have an account? Verification Verify Your Email We have sent verification link to your email You can check your inbox. Didn\'t receive the email? Send again. Refresh and Proceed or with Email Invalid email id Invalid password: must be at least 8 characters long and include a number and a special character. Don’t worry.\nEnter your email and we’ll send you a link to reset your password. Continue Your email is on the way Check your email %s and follow the instructions to reset your password AIzaSyDLiUS2bO-mnwG7KfmgR9VQtSInKlNRje4 Let\'s setup your account Camera Gallery Delete Selected "Verification failed! Please try again." "Invalid User" "Operation failed! Please try again." "Email resent!" "Email not verified!" "Permission Granted!" "Permission Denied!" "Name" "Groups "Group name" "Let's go" "New Group" "Notification" "Expense" "How much?" "₹" "Description" "Category" "Sub Category" "Payment" "Add" "Back" "Spend Limit?" "Search" "Cancel" "Currently Selected" "Saved" "Recommended" "Category already saved!" "Category exist in recommended list. Use it?" "Sub Category already saved!" "Sub Category exist in recommended list. Use it?" "Select a Category" "Select a Sub-Category" "View More" "View Less" "Enter your budget (₹)" "Group monthly budget (₹)" "Lets setup your monthly budget!" "Save" "Safe to spend limit" "Recommended: 80% of budget" "% of budget" "Info" "OK" "Note: You can edit this later." "Let's suppose your safe-to-spend limit is 80% of your budget. This helps you spend responsibly while keeping 20% for savings or unexpected expenses. Spending over the limit will use your savings, helping you stay disciplined." "Add profile photo" "You are set!" "Budget" "Safe to spend" "Let’s track our expenses together with the PennyPlanner app! Join the group for our monthly budget/trip by clicking the link: %s. Don’t have the app? Download it now and use the Group ID: %s to join manually." "Create Group" "Join Group" "Enter the group id to search and join an existing group" "Group id" "Group id is incorrect!" "Search Group" "Success" "Request to Join" "%s member(s) in this group" "Your request to join %s has been sent to the group admin for approval." "You will be notified once the admin approves your request." "Pending Approvals" "Pending Members" "Review and manage join request for your Group.\nYou can also reject all requests and close the group to prevent new join requests." "Tap here to manage approvals" "Reject All & Close Group" "Expenses(%s)" "Expenses only"
